selection_reasoning: We have reached a significant numerical plateau at 1.0000159135539168, which corresponds to the Bicapped Hexagonal Antiprism (D6d symmetry) configuration. The final generation will focus on a last-ditch effort to exceed this precision using specialized solvers or even tighter constraints.
